Services.title: WHAT I'M OFFERING
Services.intro: I build things that work flawlessly, and I design things that people love. 👨‍💻❤️ Below are my main services, ready to turn your concept into a reality.
Services.card1Desc: I design and develop custom software solutions and web applications, from concept to deployment, focusing on robust, high-performance, and intuitive products that meet your needs.
Services.card2Desc: I create strong and memorable visual identities. From logo design to branding guidelines and marketing materials, I transform your ideas into impactful visuals that tell your story.
Services.card3Desc: I bring your brand to life through animation. I produce animated logos, promotional videos, and dynamic content for social media that captures attention and engages your audience.

About.title: About Me
About.bio: Hello there! I'm a Software Engineer & Multimedia Designer from Bujumbura, with a few tricks up my sleeve. 🃏 I thrive on solving complex puzzles 🧩 and then making the solution look damn good. My goal is to blend technical magic 💻 with creative vision 🎨 to build products that don't just work flawlessly—they dazzle. ✨ After all, why so serious? When I'm not pulling digital rabbits out of a hat 🎩, you'll find me on the football field ⚽️ or sketching my next masterpiece.

Contact.title: Let's Connect
Contact.intro: Have a project? 💼 A crazy idea? 🤪 Just want to say hello? 👋 Don't be shy. My keyboard is ready ⌨️ and my design tools are waiting 🎨. Drop me a line and let's see what kind of trouble we can get into. 😈
